name: Idle Miner (Zachster)
description:
An AFK Mining game made for the Butterscotch Shenanijam 2019 where you place mining robots to collect metal for you as you grow an army and destroy the planet (Should be called Australian Government Simulator).

The game is meant to be played with the mouse only. Clicking and dragging from the top right can place new mining robots, clicking on existing robots will upgrade them.
